headline: Twenty Companies, In My Opinion, Facing Existential AI Disruption Risk
summary: AI is reshaping industries, driving the 'human plus AI' revolution. Companies that fail to embrace change with objectivity risk becoming cautionary tales. See more.

headline: Omnicom (OMC) Moves Closer to IPG Deal, Analysts Remain Optimistic
summary: Omnicom Group Inc. (NYSE:OMC) is one of the deep value stocks to buy according to analysts. On August 11, Omnicom took another step forward in its planned acquisition of Interpublic Group (IPG) by launching exchange offers for all outstanding IPG senior notes.
